MemoryInfobox.description: 'A Treasure chest|chest of gold and silver sank. On learning that it might still survive and that Piracy|pirates were searching for it, a man asked for help finding it.'

General_Description: '''Up for Grabs''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s [[Genetic memory|genetic memories]], relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: A [[civilian]] had a task for Kassandra.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra noticed a job posted on a [[message board]]. :'''Note:'''
''I offer great riches to anyone willing to help me recover them! Come see me.'' She sought out the civilian and addressed him. *'''Kassandra:''' ''I saw the note you posted. What's the matter?'' *'''Civilian:''' ''There's a [[merchant]] [[ship]] near the port with a crate of [[gold]] and [[silver]] ingots, ''[[Mercenary|misthios]]''.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''You sound like you're plotting something.'' *'''Civilian:''' ''Someone got there before me. Cursed [[Piracy|pirates]] tried to take the boat. The [[Treasure chest|chest]] must be on the ocean floor by now. The pirates still circling it.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''Sounds like I need to sink some pirate ships.'' *'''Civilian:''' ''Then you understand.'' (Accept – "I'll destroy them.") *'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm the one for the job.'' *'''Civilian:''' ''I'm sure this will be worth your while.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''May the [[Fates]] be on your side.'' Kassandra left the man and set sail. She sought out and sank multiple pirate ships before returning to the man. *'''Civilian:''' ''Back already. Did you destroy them all?'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''It would be hard to piece them back together.'' *'''Civilian:''' ''You do fine work, mercenary. Take this as thanks.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra sank pirate ships, and in return was rewarded.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
